title: Even or Odd
description: Print EVEN if n is even, else ODD
info: Use modulo n % 2 and an if/else.
starter:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables><variable id="var_n">n</variable></variables>
  <block type="text_print" x="50" y="50">
    <value name="TEXT"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_n">n</field></block></value>
  </block>
</xml>
solution:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables><variable id="var_n">n</variable></variables>
  <block type="controls_if" x="50" y="50">
    <mutation else="1"></mutation>
    <value name="IF0">
      <block type="logic_compare">
        <field name="OP">EQ</field>
        <value name="A">
          <block type="math_modulo">
            <value name="DIVIDEND"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_n">n</field></block></value>
            <value name="DIVISOR"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></shadow></value>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="B"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></shadow></value>
      </block>
    </value>
    <statement name="DO0"><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><shadow type="text"><field name="TEXT">EVEN</field></shadow></value></block></statement>
    <statement name="ELSE"><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><shadow type="text"><field name="TEXT">ODD</field></shadow></value></block></statement>
  </block>
</xml>

title: Nth Fibonacci
description: Print the nth Fibonacci number (F0=0, F1=1)
info: Handle n < 2 directly, else iterate updating a and b.
starter:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables><variable id="var_n">n</variable></variables>
  <block type="text_print" x="50" y="40">
    <value name="TEXT"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_n">n</field></block></value>
  </block>
</xml>
solution:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables>
    <variable id="var_n">n</variable><variable id="var_i">i</variable>
    <variable id="var_a">a</variable><variable id="var_b">b</variable><variable id="var_t">t</variable>
  </variables>
  <block type="controls_if" x="50" y="40">
    <mutation else="1"></mutation>
    <value name="IF0">
      <block type="logic_compare">
        <field name="OP">LT</field>
        <value name="A"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_n">n</field></block></value>
        <value name="B"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></shadow></value>
      </block>
    </value>
    <statement name="DO0">
      <block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_n">n</field></block></value></block>
    </statement>
    <statement name="ELSE">
      <block type="variables_set">
        <field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field>
        <value name="VALUE"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></shadow></value>
        <next>
          <block type="variables_set">
            <field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field>
            <value name="VALUE"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></shadow></value>
            <next>
              <block type="controls_for">
                <field name="VAR" id="var_i">i</field>
                <value name="FROM"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></shadow></value>
                <value name="TO"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_n">n</field></block></value>
                <value name="BY"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></shadow></value>
                <statement name="DO">
                  <block type="variables_set">
                    <field name="VAR" id="var_t">t</field>
                    <value name="VALUE">
                      <block type="math_arithmetic">
                        <field name="OP">ADD</field>
                        <value name="A"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field></block></value>
                        <value name="B"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <next>
                      <block type="variables_set">
                        <field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field>
                        <value name="VALUE"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value>
                        <next>
                          <block type="variables_set">
                            <field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field>
                            <value name="VALUE"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_t">t</field></block></value>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value></block></next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>

title: Prime Check
description: Print PRIME if n is prime, else NOT PRIME
info: If n<2 → NOT PRIME. Otherwise test divisors 2..n-1.
starter:

<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables><variable id="var_n">n</variable><variable id="var_i">i</variable><variable id="var_isPrime">isPrime</variable></variables>
  <block type="controls_if" x="50" y="40">

      <block type="logic_compare">
        <field name="OP">LT</field>

    <statement name="ELSE">
      <block type="variables_set">
        <field name="VAR" id="var_isPrime">isPrime</field>
        <value name="VALUE"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value>
        <next>
          <block type="controls_for">
            <field name="VAR" id="var_i">i</field>
            <value name="FROM"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">2</field></shadow></value>
            <value name="TO"><block type="math_arithmetic"><field name="OP">MINUS</field><value name="A"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_n">n</field></block></value><value name="B"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></shadow></value></block></value>
            <value name="BY"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></shadow></value>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="controls_if">
                <value name="IF0">
                  <block type="logic_compare">
                    <field name="OP">EQ</field>
                    <value name="A"><block type="math_modulo"><value name="DIVIDEND"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_n">n</field></block></value><value name="DIVISOR"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_i">i</field></block></value></block></value>
                    <value name="B"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></shadow></value>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set"><field name="VAR" id="var_isPrime">isPrime</field><value name="VALUE"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="controls_if">
                <mutation else="1"></mutation>
                <value name="IF0">
                  <block type="logic_compare">
                    <field name="OP">EQ</field>
                    <value name="A"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_isPrime">isPrime</field></block></value>

                <statement name="DO0"><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><shadow type="text"><field name="TEXT">PRIME</field></shadow></value></block></statement>

title: Greatest Common Divisor
description: Print gcd(a, b) using Euclid’s algorithm
audio: Compute G C D with modulo loop
info: While b ≠ 0: t = a % b; a = b; b = t. Print a.
starter:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables><variable id="var_a">a</variable><variable id="var_b">b</variable></variables>
  <block type="text_print" x="50" y="30">
    <value name="TEXT"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field></block></value>
  </block>
  <block type="text_print" x="50" y="90">
    <value name="TEXT"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value>
  </block>
</xml>
solution:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables><variable id="var_a">a</variable><variable id="var_b">b</variable><variable id="var_t">t</variable></variables>
  <block type="controls_whileUntil" x="50" y="40">
    <field name="MODE">WHILE</field>
    <value name="BOOL">
      <block type="logic_compare">
        <field name="OP">NEQ</field>
        <value name="A"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value>
        <value name="B"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></shadow></value>
      </block>
    </value>
    <statement name="DO">
      <block type="variables_set">
        <field name="VAR" id="var_t">t</field>
        <value name="VALUE"><block type="math_modulo"><value name="DIVIDEND"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field></block></value><value name="DIVISOR"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value></block></value>
        <next>
          <block type="variables_set">
            <field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field>
            <value name="VALUE"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value>
            <next>
              <block type="variables_set">
                <field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field>
                <value name="VALUE"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_t">t</field></block></value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </statement>
    <next><block type="text_print"><value name="TEXT"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field></block></value></block></next>
  </block>
</xml>

solution:
<xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml">
  <variables>
    <variable id="var_a">a</variable><variable id="var_b">b</variable>

    <variable id="var_t">t</variable>
  </variables>
  <block type="variables_set" x="50" y="30">
    <field name="VAR" id="var_a0">a0</field>
    <value name="VALUE"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field></block></value>
    <next>
      <block type="variables_set">
        <field name="VAR" id="var_b0">b0</field>
        <value name="VALUE"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value>
        <next>
          <block type="controls_whileUntil">
            <field name="MODE">WHILE</field>
            <value name="BOOL">
              <block type="logic_compare">
                <field name="OP">NEQ</field>
                <value name="A"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value>
                <value name="B"><shadow type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></shadow></value>

            </value>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="variables_set">
                <field name="VAR" id="var_t">t</field>
                <value name="VALUE"><block type="math_modulo"><value name="DIVIDEND"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field></block></value><value name="DIVISOR"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value></block></value>
                <next>
                  <block type="variables_set">
                    <field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field>
                    <value name="VALUE"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field></block></value>

                      <block type="variables_set">
                        <field name="VAR" id="var_b">b</field>
                        <value name="VALUE"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_t">t</field></block></value>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="text_print">
                <value name="TEXT">
                  <block type="math_arithmetic">
                    <field name="OP">DIVIDE</field>
                    <value name="A">
                      <block type="math_arithmetic">
                        <field name="OP">MULTIPLY</field>
                        <value name="A"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_a0">a0</field></block></value>
                        <value name="B"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_b0">b0</field></block></value>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="B"><block type="variables_get"><field name="VAR" id="var_a">a</field></block></value>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>
